text: Ra yasai prakarale hamile manisa tatha jinnamadhyeka saitanaharula'i hareka paigambarako satru bana'eka thiyaum. Tiniharumadhye kehile eka arkako manama cillo caplusi kuraharu dhokha dine uddesyale gardathem. Yadi allahale caheko bha'e tiniharule tyasto kama garne thi'enan. Tasartha tiniharula'i tatha tiniharule je jati mana gadhantarupama gardachan, sabai chadide'u
